sen.j: 仕丁から選抜された守辰丁（20名）を率いて漏刻を警備するとともに、時刻を計り、定時に守辰丁に命じて陰陽寮内に設置された鐘を撃たせた。
sen.e: In charge of 20 Shushincho (workers) selected from forced laborers, the Rokoku Hakase supervised the rokoku (water clock) and at the same time measured the time, and at regular intervals ordered Shushincho to strike a bell installed in the Onmyoryo.

sen.e: During an Imperial visit, one Rokoku Hakase and 12 Shushincho were obliged to join the procession, along with the rokoku.
